com.googlecode.slotted.client

Class SlottedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.slotted.client.SlottedController

  • public class SlottedController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls display of the RootSlot and all nested slots.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SlottedController.DefaultDelegate
      Default implementation of SlottedController.Delegate, based on Window.
      static interface  SlottedController.Delegate
      Optional delegate in charge of Window-related events.
      static class  SlottedController.RootSlotImpl

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlottedController

        public SlottedController(HistoryMapper historyMapper,
                 com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.EventBus eventBus)
        Create a new SlottedController with a SlottedController.DefaultDelegate. The DefaultDelegate is created via a call to GWT.create(), so an alternative default implementation can be provided through <replace-with> rules in a .gwt.xml file.
        Parameters:
        historyMapper - the HistoryMapper
        eventBus - the EventBus

      • SlottedController

        public SlottedController(HistoryMapper historyMapper,
                 com.google.web.bindery.event.shared.EventBus eventBus,
                 SlottedController.Delegate delegate)
        Create a new SlottedController.
        Parameters:
        historyMapper - the HistoryMapper
        eventBus - the EventBus
        delegate - the SlottedController.Delegate in charge of Window-related events

      • setDefaultPlace

        public void setDefaultPlace(SlottedPlace defaultPlace)
        Sets the SlottedPlace that should be displayed when the History token is empty.
        Parameters:
        defaultPlace - The place with correct parameters to display.

      • setErrorPlace

        public void setErrorPlace(SlottedErrorPlace errorPlace)
        Sets the SlottedPlace that should be displayed when there is an error parsing the History token. If this is not set, the default place is used instead.
        Parameters:
        errorPlace - The place with correct parameters to display.

      • getErrorPlace

        public SlottedErrorPlace getErrorPlace()
        Gets the ErrorPlace that was set or null if none was set.
        See Also:

      • setDisplay

        public void setDisplay(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.AcceptsOneWidget display)
        Sets the widget that displays the root slot content. This must be set before any content can be displayed.
        Parameters:
        display - an instance of AcceptsOneWidget

      • setReloadAll

        public void setReloadAll(boolean reloadAll)
        Sets reloadAll (defaults false). If the reloadAll is true, then every Activity in the hierarchy will be stopped and started again on every navigation. If false, Places/Activities that are already in the hierarchy will not be stopped, but Activities not in navigation will be stopped and new Places will have Activities started. It is possible to override the RefreshAll default value by calling goTo(SlottedPlace, SlottedPlace[], boolean).
        Parameters:
        reloadAll - The new default value to use on goTo() calls and URL changes.

      • setNavigationOverride

        public void setNavigationOverride(NavigationOverride navigationOverride)

      • setOpenWindowFeature

        public void setOpenWindowFeature(java.lang.String features)
        Set the features to pass to Window.open(String, String, String) when the SHIFT key is pressed.

      • goToDefaultPlace

        protected void goToDefaultPlace()
        Used by the HistoryMapper to display the default place. This method works as if you called goTo(Place) with the default place.

      • goToErrorPlace

        public void goToErrorPlace(java.lang.Throwable exception)

      • getReferringToken

        public java.lang.String getReferringToken()
        Returns the History Token for the referring page (the page that triggered the goTo()).

      • goTo

        public void goTo(java.lang.String historyToken)
        Request a change to a historyToken string. This is used with getReferringToken() to save a location to jump to. This will add a new Item to the History list, so the browser back button with show the page that called the goTo().
        Parameters:
        historyToken - Just the part of the url following the #. Don't send complete URLs.

      • goTo

        public void goTo(com.google.gwt.place.shared.Place newPlace)
        Request a change to a new place. It is not a given that we'll actually get there. First all active AbstractActivity.mayStop() will called. If any activities return a warning message, it will be presented to the user via SlottedController.Delegate.confirm(String[]) (which is typically a call to Window.confirm(String)) with the first warning message. If she cancels, the current location will not change. Otherwise, the location changes and the new place and all dependent places are created.
        Parameters:
        newPlace - a SlottedPlace instance

      • goTo

        public void goTo(SlottedPlace newPlace,
        SlottedPlace... nonDefaultPlaces)
        Same as goTo(Place) except adds the ability to override default places for any of the slots that will be created by the newPlace.
        Parameters:
        nonDefaultPlaces - array of SlottedPlaces that should be used instead of the default places defined for the slots.

      • goTo

        public void goTo(SlottedPlace newPlace,
        SlottedPlace[] nonDefaultPlaces,
        boolean reloadAll)
        Same as goTo(SlottedPlace, SlottedPlace...) except adds the ability to override whether the existing SlottedActivitys should be refreshed. The default is that all pages are refreshed, and this method should only be used if you don't want to refresh existing activities.
        Parameters:
        reloadAll - true if existing activities should be refreshed.
